column1: The CDC just released a domestic Travel Advisory, which is uncommon: https:/â€¦travel-in-the-us.htmlUnfortunately, I feel we will see more, and possibly stronger advisories, and possibly mandates.Stay safe folk,Hunt

Thank you for sharing.Not a mandate, but a strong hint. Traveling can be dangerous since airlines and other conveyance methods cannot be done without social distancing.Edited: 11:40 am, March 16, 2020
Swine flu redux anyone? Also called a "pandemic" at the time.
Sorry no, this is much worse than swine flu.
It's only a matter of time before airports shut down and gas pumps aren't available if stores shut down.Traveling right now shouldn't even be a consideration.
